###
API
###

Here you will find the documentation for the api methods and scripts that make up
the core of *Starfish*. For even more in-depth reference, you may wish to dig through
the source code at `GitHub <https://github.com/iancze/Starfish>`_. Make sure you have followed the :ref:`installation instructions<Installation>`
